targets.query: SELECT last("leader") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY "time" desc
SELECT LAST(median) FROM ( SELECT median(live_count) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND live_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s) )

SELECT ROUND(MEAN("sum")) FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )

SELECT MAX("median_sum") FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS median_sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count") AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )
SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS transactions FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host_id) WHERE tx_count > 0
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("duration_ms", 99) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("broadcast_count") AS "broadcast_total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND broadcast_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT median("live_count") AS "live_total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND live_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "packets" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "transactions" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-record_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-replay_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT MEAN("points_written") as "mean" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT MAX("points_written") as "max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

panels.title: Tower Distance in Latest and Root Slot ($hostid)

targets.query: SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-vote" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("root") AS "cluster-root" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT median("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT min("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."optimistic_slot" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."optimistic_slot_not_rooted" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("average_elapsed_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."optimistic_slot_elapsed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("slot_height") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-new_from_parent-heights" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("slot_height") AS "cluster-height" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-new_from_parent-heights" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("slot") AS "cluster-replay-slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay-slot-stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("slot") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay-slot-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("packets_received") as "packets_received" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("receive_errors") as "receive_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rcvbuf_errors") as "rcvbuf_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("packets_sent") as "packets_sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_octets") as "recv" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_octets") as "sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_packets") AS "num_packets" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-total_verify_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("verify_time_ms") AS "verify_time" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-total_verify_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("recv_time") AS "recv_time" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-total_verify_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) FILL(0)
SELECT last("slot_height") as "slot_height" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-new_from_parent-heights" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("block_height") as "block_height" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-new_from_parent-heights" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MEAN("slot")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MAX("slot") as "Max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MIN("slot")  as "Min" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MIN("size")  as "Min" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MAX("size")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MEAN("size")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MAX("size")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-bank-file" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MAX("size")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-status-cache-file" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MIN("duration_ms")  as "Min" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MAX("duration_ms")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT MEAN("duration_ms")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."snapshot-package" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("compact_range_us") as "max compact range" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blockstore-compact" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND  $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT max("delete_range_us") as "max delete range" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blockstore-purge" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT max("write_batch_us") as "max write batch" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blockstore-purge" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT SUM("len" )  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-queue-size" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT SUM("count") as "Transaction Retried" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-retry" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT SUM("count")  as "Transaction Rooted" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-rooted" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT SUM("count")  as "Transaction Expired" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-expired" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT SUM("count")  as "Transaction Enqueued" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-enqueue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT COUNT("count")  as "Transaction Execution Failed" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."send_transaction_service-failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT balance FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-lamport_balance" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("duration") as "Generation Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-generate_txs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT mean("duration")  as "Transmit Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-do_tx_transfers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT mean("duration") as "Get Blockhash" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-get_blockhash" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT mean("duration") as "Get Balance" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-get_balance" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT * FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."ramp-tps"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "request_amount" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."faucet-airdrop" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
